title: DevNotes
englishDescription: An app to create and publish code snippets to share with the developer community and reuse them. Developed with React for the Front and Java Spring Boot for the Back. Deployed with AWS.
spanishDescription: Una aplicaci贸n para crear y publicar lineas de codigo para compartir con la comunidad de desarrolladores y reutilizarlas. Desarrollada con React para el Front y Java Spring Boot para el Back. Desplegada con AWS.

title: Calendar App
englishDescription: A calendar app that allows users to create events and view them on a calendar. Developed with React, Redux, Node, Express and MongoDB. Deployed with Heroku.
spanishDescription: Una aplicaci贸n de calendario que permite a los usuarios crear eventos y verlos en un calendario. Desallorada con React, Redux, Node, Express y MongoDB. Desplegada con Heroku.

title: Journal App
englishDescription: A journal app that allows users to create, edit and delete notes attaching files. Developed with React, Redux, Firebase for authentication, Cloudinary for database.
spanishDescription: Una aplicaci贸n de diario que permite a los usuarios crear, editar y eliminar notas adjuntando archivos. Desallorada con React, Redux, Firebase, Cloudinary y Bootstrap.

title: MediCare App - Frontend
englishDescription: A dentist app developed with React using hooks, forms, props, testing, APIs and react router
spanishDescription: Una aplicaci贸n de dentistas desarrollada con React utilizando hooks, formularios, props, testing, APIs y react router.

title: MediCare App - Backend
englishDescription: A dentist app that allows users to create, edit and delete dentists and patients. Developed with Java, Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, MySQL, Hibernate.
spanishDescription: Una aplicacion de dentistas que permite a los usuarios crear, editar y eliminar dentistas y pacientes. Desarrollada con Java, Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, MySQL, Hibernate.
